instructions: Place the dinner fork on the left with the prong pointed vertically
Place the knife several inches to the right of the fork, blade pointed up and vertically oriented
Place the salad fork to the immediate left of the dinner fork with the prongs aligned evenly
Please the salad knife to the immediate right of the dinner knife with the blades aligned vertically
Pleace the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife, with the bowl of the spoon pointed up
Place the dessert spoon above other flatware, oriented horizontally with bowl to the left
Place the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon, oriented vertically
Place the dessert spoon horizontally and above and between the other flatware
Place the dinner plate between the dinner fork and knife, and under the dessert spoon
Place the bread plate to the left of the dessert spoon, above the forks
Place the bread knife diagonally and on the upper left in the bread plate
Place the wine glass directly above the soup spoon with the cup up
place the water glass to the right of the dessert spoon handle, and about an inch above the handle
Place the napkin in the plate center, vertically aligned
